bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huang shui chuang 黃水瘡 , yellow water sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hu yan ke tu 胡燕窠土 quoting Pu ji fang 普濟方 299: 麝香散，治頭生惡瘡， “Powder with she xiang cures malign sores on the head”. writes: 黃水肥瘡，燕窠土一分，麝 香半分，研傅之 , “For yellow water fat sores , take soil obtained from a swallow’s nest, 1 fen , and she xiang , ½ fen , grind to power, and apply externally”.
